references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational 3D Gaussian splatting technique, which the current work extends to 4D for dynamic scenes.

references.paper_title: Monocular Dynamic View Synthesis: A Reality Check
references.reason: This paper highlights the challenges of dynamic novel view synthesis using monocular videos, which directly motivates the current work's focus on handling these challenges.

references.paper_title: 4D Gaussian splatting for real-time dynamic scene rendering
references.reason: This paper is a primary baseline method for 4D Gaussian splatting that the current work builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper provides the diffusion model which is used to improve the quality and realism of the novel view synthesis.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper provides a multiscale representation for neural radiance fields which is used as a comparison method
